alert.note: Alert for Eastern Toole and Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 31 at 8:49AM MDT until April 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Toole and Liberty. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Gusty strong winds can blow away outdoor loose objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
